title: 登录显示flying is not enabled on this server
author: 随意之光
txt_content:
登录显示flying is not enabled on this server
在上次下线时处于飞行状态，再次登录后显示flying is not enabled on this server被踢出
后台刷了很多**** was kicked for floating too long!
请问这个问题如何解决

登录插件为authme

服务端为paper

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
Server.properties 中，设置

allow-flight 为 true
